entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0080.8700] ifrs-full:ProceedsFromIssueOfSubordinatedLiabilities has a value of -350,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProceedsFromIssueOfSubordinatedLiabilities fact are: Period :2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/VWMYAEQSTOPNV0SUGU82/2020-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/VWMYAEQSTOPNV0SUGU82-20201231.zip/VWMYAEQSTOPNV0SUGU82-20201231/reports/VWMYAEQSTOPNV0SUGU82-20201231.xhtml 11162

[DQR.IFRS.0101.9536] The concept ifrs-full:PaymentsFromChangesInOwnershipInterestsInSubsidiaries appears in the investing cashflows of the companies cash flow statement. ifrs-full:PaymentsFromChangesInOwnershipInterestsInSubsidiaries is a financing item and it is expected that this item would only appear in the cash flow generated from financing activities. Please review the calculations defined for the cash flow statement to determine that the correct element has been used for this item.
Rule Element Id:9536 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0102.9543] Resultado global with a value of 277,605 is not equal to the combined total of Ganancia (pérdida) and Otro resultado global ( 317,123 + 39,518 ) with a value of 356,641.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncome fact are: Period :2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Resultado global : 3 Decimals of Ganancia (pérdida) : 3 Decimals of Otro resultado global : 3
Rule Element Id:9543 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/VWMYAEQSTOPNV0SUGU82/2020-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/VWMYAEQSTOPNV0SUGU82-20201231.zip/VWMYAEQSTOPNV0SUGU82-20201231/reports/VWMYAEQSTOPNV0SUGU82-20201231.xhtml 11162

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 1001002 - Statement - Estado de situación financiera, orden de liquidez (Statement) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. bankinter-2020-12-31:ProMemoriaPrestadosOEntregadosComoGarantiaConDerechoDeVentaOPignoracion, bankinter-2020-12-31:GarantiasFinancierasConcedidas, ifrs-full:Assets, ifrs-full:DerivativeFinancialAssetsHeldForHedging, ifrs-full:AssetsUnderInsuranceContractsAndReinsuranceContractsIssued, bankinter-2020-12-31:ProMemoriaPasivosSubordinados, bankinter-2020-12-31:ProMemoriaPasivosSubordinadosACosteAmortizado, bankinter-2020-12-31:CambiosDelValorRazonableDeLosElementosCubiertosDeUnaCarteraConCoberturaDelRiesgoDeTipoDeInteres, bankinter-2020-12-31:ProMemoriaPrestadosOEntregadosComoGarantiaConDerechoDeVentaOPignoracion3, bankinter-2020-12-31:DeLosCualesFondoDeLaObraSocialSoloCajasDeAhorrosYCooperativasDeCredito, bankinter-2020-12-31:ProMemoriaCapitalNoExigido, bankinter-2020-12-31:ProMemoriaPrestadosOEntregadosComoGarantiaConDerechoDeVentaOPignoracion4, ifrs-full:NoncurrentAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSaleOrAsHeldForDistributionToOwners, bankinter-2020-12-31:ProMemoriaAdquiridoEnArrendamiento, bankinter-2020-12-31:CompromisosDePrestamosConcedidos, bankinter-2020-12-31:EfectivoSaldosEnEfectivoEnBancosCentralesYOtrosDepositosALaVista, bankinter-2020-12-31:OtrosCompromisosConcedidos, bankinter-2020-12-31:ProMemoriaPrestadosOEntregadosComoGarantiaConDerechoDeVentaOPignoracion5, bankinter-2020-12-31:ProMemoriaPrestadosOEntregadosComoGarantiaConDerechoDeVentaOPignoracion2 All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 1006003 - Statement - Estado del resultado global, de resultados, por naturaleza del gasto (Statement) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. bankinter-2020-12-31:GastosPorCapitalSocialReembolsableALaVista, bankinter-2020-12-31:DeLosCualesDotacionesObligatoriasAFondosDeLaObraSocialSoloCajasDeAhorrosYCooperativasDeCredito, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 1016005 - Statement - Estado de flujos de efectivo, método indirecto (Statement) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:IncreaseDecreaseInCashAndCashEquivalents, ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInFinancingActivities All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
If the item is an additional disclosure in the cash flow statement then make sure that is included as a child of DisclosureOfCashFlowStatementExplanatory or the following abstracts IncomeTaxesPaidRefundAbstract, CashAndCashEquivalentsIfDifferentFromStatementOfFinancialPositionAbstract, DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract, ChangesInLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesAbstract or DisclosureOfReconciliationOfLiabilitiesArisingFromFinancingActivitiesLineItems.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9603] It is expected that TreasuryShares with a value of 3,641 reported in the network role http://www.bankinter.com/role/EstadodesituacinfinancieraordendeliquidezStatement should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:TreasurySharesMember and a reported value of 3,641 multiplied by -1. This value appears in the network role http://www.bankinter.com/role/EstadodecambiosenelpatrimonionetoStatement. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:TreasuryShares fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of TreasuryShares : 3 Decimals of Equity : 3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/VWMYAEQSTOPNV0SUGU82/2020-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/VWMYAEQSTOPNV0SUGU82-20201231.zip/VWMYAEQSTOPNV0SUGU82-20201231/reports/VWMYAEQSTOPNV0SUGU82-20201231.xhtml 11162
